33 class V_COREEXPORT Identify: public MessageBase<Identify, IDENTIFY> {
34 
35  public:
36  DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(Identity,
37  (UNKNOWN)
38  (REQUEST) //< request receiver to send its identity
39  (UI) //< user interface
40  (MANAGER) //< cluster manager
41  (HUB) //< master hub
42  (SLAVEHUB) //< slave hub
43  (LOCALBULKDATA) //< bulk data transfer to local MPI ranks
44  (REMOTEBULKDATA) //< bulk data transfer to remote hubs
45  );
46 
47  Identify(Identity id, const std::string &name = "");
48  Identify(Identity id, int rank);
49  Identity identity() const;
50  const char *name() const;
51  int rank() const;
52  int boost_archive_version() const;
53 
54  private:
55  Identity m_identity;
56  text_t m_name;
57  int m_rank;
58  int m_boost_archive_version;
59 };
60 static_assert(sizeof(Identify) <= Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
61 V_ENUM_OUTPUT_OP(Identity, Identify)

672 class V_COREEXPORT SchedulingPolicy: public MessageBase<SchedulingPolicy, SCHEDULINGPOLICY> {
673 
674 public:
675  DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(Schedule,
676  (Ignore) //< prepare/compute/reduce not called at all (e.g. for renderers)
677  (Single) //< compute called on each rank individually once per received object
678  (Gang) //< compute called on all ranks together once per received object
679  (LazyGang) //< compute called on all ranks together, but not necessarily for each received object
680  )
681  SchedulingPolicy(Schedule pol);
682  Schedule policy() const;
683 private:
684  Schedule m_policy;
685 };
686 static_assert(sizeof(SchedulingPolicy) <= Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
687 V_ENUM_OUTPUT_OP(Schedule, SchedulingPolicy)
688 
689 class V_COREEXPORT ReducePolicy: public MessageBase<ReducePolicy, REDUCEPOLICY> {
691 
692  public:
693  DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(Reduce,
694  (Never) //< module's prepare()/reduce() methods will never be called - only for modules with COMBINE port (renderers)
695  (Locally) //< module's prepare()/reduce() methods will be called unsynchronized on each rank
696  (PerTimestep) //< module's reduce() method will be called on all ranks together once per timestep
697  (PerTimestepOrdered) //< module's reduce() method will be called on all ranks together once per timestep in ascending order
698  (PerTimestepZeroFirst) //< module's reduce() method will be called on all ranks together once per timestep in arbitrary order, but zero first
699  (OverAll) //< module's prepare()/reduce() method will be called on all ranks together after all timesteps have been received
700  )
701  ReducePolicy(Reduce red);
702  Reduce policy() const;
703  private:
704  Reduce m_reduce;
705 };
706 static_assert(sizeof(ReducePolicy) <= Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
707 V_ENUM_OUTPUT_OP(Reduce, ReducePolicy)
708

721  )

802  unsigned short srcPort() const;
803  unsigned short destPort() const;
804  AddressType destType() const;
805  bool destIsAddress() const;
806  std::string destHost() const;
807  boost::asio::ip::address destAddr() const;
808  boost::asio::ip::address_v6 destAddrV6() const;
809  boost::asio::ip::address_v4 destAddrV4() const;
810  bool remove() const;
811 
812  private:
813  unsigned short m_srcPort;
814  AddressType m_destType;
815  text_t m_destAddr;
816  unsigned short m_destPort;
817  bool m_remove;
818 };
819 static_assert(sizeof(RequestTunnel) <= Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
